page.title: 18THE LICKEY HILLS
page.content: {Tourism} In our area the main tourist attraction is the Lickey Hills ,which consists of Beacon,Rose and Bilberry Hills.Each year thousands of people visit the Lickey Hills to walk in the woods,pick bilberries,see the ducks on the pond,look at the flowers and in the winter enjoy the deep snow on Beacon Hill. On Rose Hill there is a hotel called The Old Rose and Crown Hotel and people have stayed there from many countries. A BMX team from Germany practised on the hills for the World Championships. {Ski slope Mr Hal Miller, MP for Bromsgrove, has proposed the building of an all_weather ski slope.
